name: GewissSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, set thermostat to 20 degrees”
”Alexa, activate exit scene”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Manage all home functions with simple voice commands. Ask the skill to turn on, turn off or adjust the intensity of lights, move shutters, run scenes, adjust the temperature and much more.

With Gewiss Smart, you can control all Zigbee devices connected to the Gewiss Smart (essential to use this skill): thermostats, dimmable lights, controlled sockets, scenes, and more.

Associating the Home Gateway account with the Amazon Alexa account, all Home Gateway-controlled devices are also made available in the Alexa device list and can also be controlled through your smart speaker.
